abstract.text: Allows the delegate to return a noninteractive animator object for use during view controller transitions.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The navigation controller whose navigation stack is changing.
The type of transition operation that is occurring. For a list of possible values, see the
constants.
The currently visible view controller.
The view controller that should be visible at the end of the transition.
The animator object responsible for managing the transition animations, or
if you want to use the standard navigation controller transitions. The object you return must conform to the
protocol.

Implement this delegate method when you want to provide a custom animated transition between view controllers as they are added to or removed from the navigation stack. The object you return should be capable of configuring and performing noninteractive animations for the specified view controllers for the specified type of operation over a fixed period of time.
If you want to allow the user to perform interactive transitions, you must
also
implement the
method.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.
A container view controller that defines a stack-based scheme for navigating hierarchical content.
Constants that define the type of navigation controller transitions that can occur.
The interface for an object that serves as a navigation controller’s delegate.
Allows the delegate to return a noninteractive animator object for use during view controller transitions.
Allows the delegate to return an interactive animator object for use during view controller transitions.
Returns the preferred orientation for presentation of the navigation controller, as determined by the delegate.
Returns the complete set of supported interface orientations for the navigation controller, as determined by the delegate.
An object that manages a view hierarchy for your UIKit app.
A set of methods for implementing the animations for a custom view controller transition.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
